channel.title: CVE Feed for github.com/gorilla/handlers -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for github.com/gorilla/handlers -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-20146|2024-08-05T21:45:25.986Z -- github.com%2Fgorilla%2Fhandlers -- github.com%2Fgorilla%2Fhandlers
item.description: Usage of the CORS handler may apply improper CORS headers, allowing the requester to explicitly control the value of the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header, which bypasses the expected behavior of the Same Origin Policy.
